r.d:
Piece_ORM is an object-relational mapping framework.
Piece_ORM is a simple framework based on the DataMapper pattern, and features stdClass centered approach.
r.n:
A new release of Piece_ORM is now available.
What's New in Piece_ORM 0.6.0
* Many-to-many relationships defect fixed: A defect that caused many-to-many relationships to fail if a inverse table contained a underscore separated primary key is fixed. * Default queries: The default query is automatically generated if the query for a method is not given. * Static Sort Orders: Static sort orders can be defined by mapper definition files.
See the following release notes for details.
Enhancements ============
- Added a feature so that the default query is automatically generated if the query for a method is not given. - Added support for static sort order by mapper definition files. (Ticket #48)
Defect Fixes ============
- Fixed a defect that caused many-to-many relationships to fail if a inverse table contained a underscore separated primary key. (#Ticket 49)
